name: EPIC Ultra Bacon Lava Dinosaur EXTREME Monster Truck Fire Penguin "Man am I bad at combat" Brotherhood 3
name_original: EPIC Ultra Bacon Lava Dinosaur EXTREME Monster Truck Fire Penguin "Man am I bad at combat" Brotherhood 3
description:
Two buttons: Move and Attack. Up to four players. Will you become victorious?

You must connect controllers for >2 players. If not, the game will crash.

Made in two days for the Shammy Jam, by Daniel Tian, Murphy Justian, and Shaquim Lowe.

(lore in title)
